definition: to be at loggerheads/to have a falling out
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke
shield/(currency) Vietnamese dong/currency unit of several countries (Indonesian rupiah, Dutch gulden etc)

sentences.english: But one morning Brother and Sister don't get along well!
sentences.chinese: 但是有一天早晨熊哥哥和熊妹妹鬧矛盾了。

sentences.english: He had often been in trouble with the police.
sentences.chinese: 過去他常和警察鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: I have never got on badly with anybody.
sentences.chinese: 我從沒有與任何人鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: Thee man often has trouble with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 這個人經常同他的妻子鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: He often has trouble with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他經常和他的妻子鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: In these cases, it may also be necessary to separate the females in question.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，分開鬧矛盾的雌性豬豬就非常重要了。

sentences.english: Do you know a couple whose marriage is struggling?
sentences.chinese: 你知道哪一對夫妻鬧矛盾嗎？

sentences.english: Between you and me, I think she has a problem with her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 你別說出去，我想她和男朋友鬧矛盾了。

sentences.english: The man often has trouble with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人經常與他的妻子鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: Then one day, after a misunderstanding, Joyce stopped talking to Jessica.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，兩人鬧矛盾，喬依絲不再和傑西卡說話了。

sentences.english: I wonder why sometimes we fall apart …oh yeah.
sentences.chinese: 我納悶爲什麼有些時候我們會鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: As wife and mother of contradictions I the son of the measures to be taken?
sentences.chinese: 當老婆和媽鬧矛盾了我這個做兒子的該採取哪些措施？

sentences.english: Sometimes our conflicts will break the peace.
sentences.chinese: 有時你我鬧矛盾打破寧靜。

sentences.english: The first example is of a situation where you're not getting along with your best friend.
sentences.chinese: 第一個例子是你跟你最好的朋友最近鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: These two roommates often come into conflict.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個室友經常鬧矛盾。

sentences.english: The children are often in conflict with each other over toys.
sentences.chinese: 這些孩子經常因爲爭搶玩具鬧矛盾。
